summary: Implements a configurable UNet architecture with encoder‑decoder pathways, residual blocks, multi‑head attention, and timestep embeddings, supporting 1D/2D/3D data, class‑conditional conditioning, checkpointing, and mixed‑precision operations.
business_intent: Provide a versatile backbone for diffusion‑based generative models that can be tailored to various data dimensions, conditioning schemes, and performance constraints, enabling efficient training and inference of high‑quality image/video generation pipelines.
